title: User (v4) create
description: For new user creation. url: https://route4me.com/api.v4/user.php

api_key.title: API key
api_key.description: API key of an user. HTTP method - GET

HIDE_ROUTED_ADDRESSES.title: Hide Routed Addresses
HIDE_ROUTED_ADDRESSES.description: Hide routed sddresses, ENUM['TRUE', 'FALSE']. HTTP method - POST.

member_phone.title: Member Phone
member_phone.description: A phone number of the user. HTTP method - POST.

member_zipcode.title: Zip code
member_zipcode.description: The 5-7 digit ZIP code (minimum length of 5)). HTTP method - POST.

member_email.title: Member Email
member_email.description: E-mail address of the user that was used for site registration. HTTP method - POST.

HIDE_VISITED_ADDRESSES.title: Hide Visited Addresses
HIDE_VISITED_ADDRESSES.description: Hide visited sddresses, ENUM['TRUE', 'FALSE']. HTTP method - POST.

READONLY_USER.title: Readonly User
READONLY_USER.description: Readonly user, ENUM['TRUE', 'FALSE']. HTTP method - POST.

member_type.title: Member Type
member_type.description: Member type, ENUM [PRIMARY_ACCOUNT, SUB_ACCOUNT_ADMIN, SUB_ACCOUNT_REGIONAL_MANAGER, SUB_ACCOUNT_DISPATCHER, SUB_ACCOUNT_PLANNER, SUB_ACCOUNT_DRIVER]. HTTP method - POST.

date_of_birth.title: Date of Birth
date_of_birth.description: Date of birth. HTTP method - POST.

member_first_name.title: Member First Name
member_first_name.description: The first name of the user. HTTP method - POST.

HIDE_NONFUTURE_ROUTES.title: Hide Nonfuture Routes
HIDE_NONFUTURE_ROUTES.description: Hide non-future routes, ENUM['TRUE', 'FALSE']. HTTP method - POST.

member_last_name.title: Member Last Name
member_last_name.description: The last name of the user. HTTP method - POST.

SHOW_ALL_VEHICLES.title: Show All Vehicles
SHOW_ALL_VEHICLES.description: Show all vehicles, ENUM['TRUE', 'FALSE']. HTTP method - POST.

SHOW_ALL_DRIVERS.title: Show All Drivers
SHOW_ALL_DRIVERS.description: Show all drivers, ENUM['TRUE', 'FALSE']. HTTP method - POST.

SHOW_SUSR_ADDR.title: Show Global Addresses
SHOW_SUSR_ADDR.description: Show global address book contacts in a user's account, ENUM['TRUE', 'FALSE']. HTTP method - POST.

SHOW_SUSR_ORDERS.title: Show Global Orders
SHOW_SUSR_ORDERS.description: Show global orders in a user's account, ENUM['TRUE', 'FALSE']. HTTP method - POST.

level.title: Level
level.description: Subordination level. 0 is the highest level.
